title: Deficit spending raises i rates, decreases Xn

content.prompt: Country X’s government increases its spending without raising taxes. Which of the following is true about the effect on Country X’s real interest rates and its subsequent effect on Country X’s net exports?

choices.label: Real interest rates increase and net exports increase.
Real interest rates increase and net exports decrease.
Real interest rates increase with no change in net exports.
Real interest rates decrease and net exports increase.
Real interest rates decrease and net exports decrease.

unit.text: 6: Open Economy - International Trade and Finance

topic.text: 6.5: Changes in the Foreign Exchange Market and Net Exports

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Determine the effect(s) of one or more changes on other economic markets.
